title: oc 6: insufficient storage when uploading large set of files
body:
hi

i had setup a new client account for backing up data and thought i can run it overnight. but all i got was a "insufficient storage" message from client (macos maverick)

taking a look into webfrontend of this account reported a strange message. 
![insufficient-storage1](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/1209876/1789521/66a72654-695b-11e3-9538-35bd3f5f9c10.png)

after logout/login from/in webui it works again. i saw the bug reporting this (#5163) but 'cause this is marked as closed i report it again - with 6.0.0a it isn't fixed.

i didn't found something related in owncloudlog, i have 2.5 tb free space for owncloud data, the limit for this client has just 10% filled (switching to unlimited didn't help btw)

any ideas for a workaround?
